bs-blog-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of blog extension
prefs-blog:
Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], headline for blog section in preferences.
{{Identical|Blog}}
bs-blog-no-entries: Text for there are no blog entries.
bs-blog-comments:
Text shown for display text and title attribute of the link to the comments section of a blog entry.
{{Identical|Comment}}
bs-blog-read-more:
Anchor title for read more
{{Identical|Read more}}
bs-blog-show-all: Anchor title for show all entries
bs-blog-form-inline-text:
Text to be displayed as a hint in the input field that this field is for the title of a blog entry. Goes away when the user clicks the input field to enter a title.
{{Identical|Title}}
bs-blog-form-title-text: Headline for create new blog entry
bs-blog-pref-moreinnewwindow: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for open new window for read more
bs-blog-pref-newentryfieldposition: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for position for the new blog entry form:
bs-blog-pref-showall: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for show all entries link
bs-blog-pref-showinfo: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for show information about the entry
bs-blog-pref-showlimit: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for number of blog entries:
bs-blog-pref-shownewentryfield: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for show new blog entry form
bs-blog-pref-showpermalink: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], checkbox label for show permalink link
bs-blog-pref-sortby:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences].

Used as label for the select box having the following items (hard-coded):
* creation
* title
{{Identical|Sort by}}
bs-blog-pref-imagerendermode:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences].

Used as label for the select box having the following items (hard-coded):
* thumb
* full
* none
bs-blog-pref-imagefloatdirection:
Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences].

Used as label for the select box having the following items (hard-coded):
* left
* right
* none
bs-blog-pref-maxentrycharacters: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for number of words per entry:
bs-blog-pref-preload: Option in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=Preferences}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=Preferences], label for the article title, that should be used for preload on new blog entries:
bs-blog-tag-blog-desc:
Used in InsertMagic extension, tag description for display blog entries on every page.
{{Related|Bs-tag-desc}}
bs-blog-tag-blogmore-desc:
Used in InsertMagic extension, tag description for setting teaser boundary on every page.
{{Related|Bs-tag-desc}}
bs-blog-tag-blogtime-desc:
Used in InsertMagic extension, tag description for setting blog timestamp on every page.
{{Related|Bs-tag-desc}}
bs-blog-tag-blogtime-err:
Error message on bs:blog:time tag when there is a wrong timestamp format.
Should be YYYYMMDDHHmm (YmdHi).
bs-tag-blog: Name of the descriptor used in [[Special:UsageTracker|Special:UsageTracker]] output
action-blog-viewspecialpage:
placeholder to describe that view of special page "{{int:bs-blog-blog}}" is restricted for the current user

{{Doc-action|blog-viewspecialpage}}
bs-blog-rss-desc-blog: Description of blog entry RSS feed
